title: Alphabet Inc. Cl A stock rises Thursday, still underperforms market
text:
Shares of Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       inched 0.04% higher to $150.93 Thursday, on what proved to be an all-around great trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       rising 0.11% to 5,254.35 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.12% to 39,807.37. This was the stock's third consecutive day of gains. Alphabet Inc. Cl A closed $2.85 short of its 52-week high ($153.78), which the company reached on January 29th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Thursday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       fell 0.17% to $420.72, Amazon.com Inc. 
        AMZN,
        +0.31%
       rose 0.31% to $180.38, and Meta Platforms Inc. 
        META,
        -1.68%
       fell 1.68% to $485.58. Trading volume (24.0 M) remained 8.9 million below its 50-day average volume of 32.9 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. Something unusual happened in the stock market this quarter: Both the S&P 500 and Cboe Volatility Index, better known as the Vix, rose.
